channel.title: Projects on Julian Markiewicz
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Julian Markiewicz

item.title: News reader
item.description: Based mainly on requests made to Google news API, news reader. This short project also utilizes Weatherbit API. In this project technologies such as angular2, bootstrap were used.
item.content: Based mainly on requests made to Google news API, news reader. This short project also utilizes Weatherbit API. In this project technologies such as angular2, bootstrap were used.

item.title: Project management tool
item.description: Simple Jira is a clone that allows people in a project to manage tasks and sprints. In this project technologies such as angular2, bootstrap, node.js and mongoDB were used.
item.content: Simple Jira is a clone that allows people in a project to manage tasks and sprints. In this project technologies such as angular2, bootstrap, node.js and mongoDB were used.
